segments.text: What are your terms of payment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What if we purchase an increased quantity ? Can you give us better terms ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You would have to order in excess of 10,000 units to be eligible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do not have the space in our warehouse to store over 5,000 units .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: An option we can offer is two separate shipments.We will house the inventory until you are ready for us to ship it to you .
segments.speaker: S2
